Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

Properties.Description: Pulls posts related to watchlist symbols and sends a notification
Pulls posts related to the holdings that users have when they've signed up with a brokerage account
Send a notification to a user who follows someone, and that someone has new holds/has made trades
Generates tasks for brokerage to process
Runs brokerage tasks that are pushed to SQS queue -- rather than on cadence
Ingests securities, exchanges, in the morning, in the evening it ingests stats, quotes, and closing pricing
Ingests market holidays once a year
Ingests intraday pricing
Ingests pricing for securities after market close & allow for 15min delay to kick in
Prunes security data
Ingests Spotify User Data
Ingests Substack Data
Ingests Twitter Data
Ingests YouTube User Data
